item.title: 建站記錄
item.description:
Documentation: how to initialize a basic static site like this with Github page, Hugo and Go.
記錄文檔：如何使用Github page，Hugo和Go便利地建造本站的基礎元素.

System Enviroment

OSX El Capitan 10.11.3
MacBook Pro（Retina，13 inch, early 2015)
CPU: 2.7 GHz Intel Core i5
Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics 6100 1536 MB

Steps

  1. Hugo is compiled by Go, thus before everything, install Go and set up its enviroment path.
  2. Follow this link to install Hugo and set up everything. You may also need another link.

Tips:

  • Path may vary with the theme you chose, so always check with the theme page for what path should be used for post.
  • Always remember: public push to [your github account].github.io for publication, (optional) parent dir. push to [your github account]_hugo for archive.
  • Change the social icon: Social links are designed with FontAwesome 4.5.0. For occasional modification, just edit the header.html, find:
    > class=“fa fa-xxx”
    substitute xxx with the icon name you want (and ofc supported by FontAwesome), do not touch .Site.Params.xxx if you just want it simple.
  • If you are not familiar with markdown, find the instruction regarding markdown syntax here.
  • Develope comment board with disqus: register a short name then fill it in the config file
  • Change the Square to superscript： edit /public/index.html, replace INCH2 with INCH2 except for the label.</li> </ul> <h3 id="paste-some-frequently-used-order-here:44e997d1ffd2378e52888c50f9174fd1">Paste some frequently-used order here:)</h3> <pre><code>hugo new post/first.md hugo server -w **or** hugo server --theme=slender --buildDrafts --watch hugo **or** hugo --theme=slender --baseUrl="http://xren615.github.io/" </code></pre>
